metadata.min_stack_comments: New fields added: required_fields, related_integrations, setup

author: Elastic
rule.description:
Elastic Endgame detected an Exploit. Click the Elastic Endgame icon in the event.module column or the link in the
rule.reference column for additional information.
rule.name: Exploit - Detected - Elastic Endgame
rule.query: event.kind:alert and event.module:endgame and endgame.metadata.type:detection and (event.action:exploit_event or endgame.event_subtype_full:exploit_event)
